dojo.name: The Shadow Terminal
dojo.description: Training in the arts of the command line. Master the terminal, master the system.
dojo.entry_ritual: Close the GUI. Open the terminal. Now you see the truth.

skills.name: Shadow Walking
skills.training: Practice: cd, ls, pwd, cat, less without thinking.

skills.name: Sleight of Hand
skills.description: Move, copy, delete, rename with precision
skills.training: Practice: mv, cp, rm, mkdir, touch fluently.

skills.name: Find the Mark
skills.description: Search text with grep, awk, sed
skills.training: Practice: Find specific patterns in large files.

skills.name: Chain Attacks
skills.training: Practice: Build complex pipelines that transform data.

skills.name: Poison Crafting
skills.training: Practice: Automate a repetitive task with a script.

skills.name: Crowd Control
skills.training: Practice: ps, kill, bg, fg, jobs, nohup, &.

skills.name: Shadow Step
skills.training: Practice: Access remote systems, transfer files, create tunnels.
skills.mastery_check: Is remote as easy as local?

tier_4_shadow_master.name: Shadow Master

skills.name: Shadow Clone
skills.training: Practice: Containerize an application, manage containers.

skills.name: Reality Warping
skills.training: Practice: Define infrastructure in code, apply changes.
skills.mastery_check: Can you summon infrastructure from code?

skills.name: Cloud Walking
skills.training: Practice: Deploy, scale, manage applications on k8s.

tier_4_shadow_master.warning: At this level, you control the infrastructure itself.

training_quests.name: The One-Liner
training_quests.description: Solve a complex problem in a single pipeline
training_quests.objective: Process, transform, and output data in one command

training_quests.name: The Automation
training_quests.objective: Create a script that saves you time every day

training_quests.name: The Shadow Clone
training_quests.objective: Take an app from code to running container

quick_load: Load rogue dojo. I'm in the terminal. What commands do I need to master? What should I automate?
